title: Can a Tamil Nadu state board student crack NEET? - Quora

response.answer_text: Surely you can! Firstly you should not think that CBSE portion is very different from state board. I have gone through it and more than 80 percent is the same! Secondly you should change the way you study since most of the toppers of state board just mug up the textbook and vomit it out during the exam.You should understand each and every concept in all subjects(even biology!).Most importantly COVER 11TH GRADE SYLLABUS RELIGIOUSLY(Since most stateboard students study 12th grade for both the years) If you cant afford coaching, watch Youtube videos of Examfear to understand the basics.Then for reaching advanced level(NEET level) in the subject watch videos of Egr. DUSHYANTH KUMAR ,Dr.PRADDEEP KSHETRAPAL Dr. NEELA BAKORE for Chemistry,Physics and Biology. It's better you focus on Ncert first and try to understand each and every concept (I repeat each and every concept). Next buy Ncert at your fingertips by MTG and solve each chapter atleast 3 times before the D-day. Make sure to complete 100 questions in 60 minutes. You will be able to complete the bio part in the real exam within 25 to 30 minutes That's enough to get 320-330 in Biology . I suggest you to focus the rest of your time in Physics and Chemistry instead of mugging up scientific names from insane guides like Arihant. Lastly don't get sick during the exam(happened to me and trust me it was the most painful experience of my life). All your pain will go in vain:( And all this pain will be amplified by your parents,relatives and friends. All your hardwork depends on those 3 hours. So stay healthy! I am suggesting you these methods by the mistakes I made during my preparation.I was definitely the most hardworking and may the smartest but I didn't do smartwork. P.S. The only right thing that I did was that I didn't focus on boards and instead focused almost entirely on entrances. All the best! I am sure you will do well! Joel Jack

Yes, sure. Anyone can crack neet if he/she studies in the right way. The board doesn't matter only the preparation matters. First of all, the most common myth that only cbse students can crack all entrance exams is a big lie. Anyone can crack NEET if he has prepared well. The board of study doesn't matter. The prescribed syllabus of neet is moreover same as cbse class 12 and 11 syllabus. But, state board and cbse has nearly the same syllabus. But, the way of study matters. State board students are trained to memorize and vomit the same. They are never taught to understand and to use their application skill. But, cbse students have to use their application skill. So, it is easy for them to crack entrance examinations which solely needs understanding and application skills. When you understand and know to apply your knowledge by reading the state board books, it's enough. For example, my friend whom I have already mentioned in one of my answers is a state board student. She scored 290 marks in neet,only with what she have studied in state board book even without mere preparation. That too, only 12th standard books. I scored 130 in neet with zero preparation. I didn't even study state board books properly. If you study both 11 th and 12 th books, you could surely crack neet with flying colors.

Never give up; being a CBSE student is not a prerequisite to crack NEET, Tamil Nadu Stateboard students can also do it by the way of hard work. NEET syllabus based on CBSE syllabus but the Stateboard syllabus is completely vary from CBSE syllabus. As a stateboard student you have to concentrate on your board exam as well as NEET so cracking the entrance exam is becoming tough. For Tamil Nadu stateboard students NEET self study is not suitable.  Joining in a Best NEET coaching centres is a smart way to crack medical entrance. Their effective study materials, simple tricks and tips, mock tests will help you to achieve your dream easily. Be positive, think positive and go with NEET exam coaching centres and yes automatically your result will also be a good one.

It's 50/50 chance if you from state Board syllabus. The CBSE NEET exam pattern & syllabus are Revised from CBSE Yes a normal state Board student can crack NEET with determination.Revise each and every subject by weekDon't mag up ( 80% students are doing in state Board exam).For those who are feel being uncomfortable with state Board syllabus it's not your problem. But ruined by TN govt. Thank you

I am sure yes. With no other option than to compete in NEET, I am confident state board students will come out with flying colours. Don't listen to politicians. They always made state board students are useless and are not up-to the mark to compete at national level. It is time to prove them wrong. Hard work never fails. Wish you all the best.

Sure All it requires is the knowledge of the syllabus,determination,preparation and intelligence. It is inevitable to read the CBSE NCERT syllabus! It is the base of NEET.You can check out Medical Council of India's prescribed syllabus: NATIONAL ELIGIBILITY AND ENTRANCE TEST-UG All the keys are subtopics of NCERT book. The moral is : It is Difficult but it is POSSIBLE ! All the best..!
Yes but little tough ! In my batch at Pioneer Academy at Chennai out of 38 students( all are state board), 11 students scored 400+ marks, 14 scored 300+. So its possible with help of good teachers.
